title: The Morning Lesson
story: Teacher, I have a question to ask. What is your question? Are we going to play this morning? Yes, we are, but not right now. When are we going to play? As soon as we finish our lesson. Can't we go a little early today? Maybe, if we finish our lesson early.
summary: A group of children eagerly ask their teacher about when they will be able to play, and the teacher explains that they will play as soon as they finish their lesson.
image: An image of a group of children sitting attentively in a classroom, with one child raising their hand to ask a question.
